section1.content1: House of Wardians is a strategic auto-battle game focused on fighter management and progression.
section1.content2: Designed to offer an accessible yet deep experience, HoW blends RPG, collection, and customization elements with asynchronous multiplayer structure ideal for mobile play.

section2.description: Designed to offer an accessible yet deep experience, HoW blends RPG, collection, and customization elements with asynchronous multiplayer structure ideal for mobile play.

features.text1: Prepare your team with smart combinations. Battles are automatic, but strategy makes the difference.

features.text2: Recruit, train and evolve unique creatures. Each Wardian has abilities to build your own playstyle.

features.text3: Change the style and arsenal of your Wardians. Explore unique combinations and gain a tactical edge.

features.text4: Compete in the league or challenge friends. Play quick or deep â€” you choose.

features.text5: Play against others without needing to be online at the same time. Play at your pace, always progressing.

features.text6: Every match makes you stronger. Improve characters, earn trophies, and unlock rewards in ongoing evolution.

questions.question: WHAT IS HOUSE OF WARDIANS?
questions.answer: House of Wardians is inspired by the classic browser game 'El Bruto', reimagined for today's mobile world with deeper mechanics and high player impact...

questions.question: WHAT PLATFORMS WILL IT BE ON?
questions.answer: The game is designed exclusively for Android and iOS devices.

questions.question: WILL MORE CONTENT BE ADDED?
questions.answer: Absolutely! This is just the first version...

questions.question: WILL THE GAME BE FREE?
questions.answer: Yes, House of Wardians will be completely free to download and play...

questions.question: HOW CAN I WIN MORE BATTLES?
questions.answer: Even though the battles are automatic, your decisions impact the outcome...

questions.question: WILL I KEEP MY WARDIANS IN THE FINAL VERSION?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, no. During alpha/beta, the game will undergo changes and data will be reset...
